title: Israel says first country to use U.S.-made F-35 in combat
text: Israel says first country to use U.S.-made F-35 in combat reuters.com • Israel says first country to use U.S.-made F-35 in combat More JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel is the first country to have used the U.S.-made F-35 stealth fighter in combat, the Israeli air force chief said on Tuesday in remarks carried by the military's official Twitter account. Israeli media further quoted Major-General Amikam Norkin as saying: “We are flying the F-35 all of the Middle East and have already attacked twice on two different fronts”. Writing by Dan Williams; Editing by Jeffrey Heller
